name: Critter Wars
description:
Critter Wars is Studio Mooli's first game submission. It was created in 3 days (for 8x8 Game Jam 2 hosted by SuperGamersGames)! WOOHOO! This was only meant to be a silly little foray into Game Jams, but the little critters grew on us, so we might update this down the line.

Gameplay

Simple tower defense. Click on the two tower options at the top and build on the map. Esc if you want to pause the game or restart.

Credits

BitScript font by usr_share.

Fast fight / battle music by Ville Nousiainen

Everything else homecooked by Studio Mooli! Follow us @StudioMooli on Instagram, Twitter, and Facebook.
